REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0941 reute b f BC-UK-MONEY-MARKET-GIVEN 03-12 0061

TEXT.TITLE: UK MONEY MARKET GIVEN FURTHER TWO MLN STG HELP
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it gave the market further assistance of two mln stg during the afternoon, buying that amount of band two bank bills at 10-5/16 pct. The bank has given the market assistance worth 1.503 billion stg today to offset a shortage it estimated at a revised 1.60 billion. REUTER
